price: Na muabudu Mola wako Mlezi mpaka ikufikie Yakini. (nao ni Mauti)
footnotes: Na shikilia ibada ya Mwenyezi Mungu aliye kuumba, akakulinda, mpaka ifike amri ya yakini, nayo ni Mauti.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
